meanings.definition: The act of making someone noble or of higher social status.
meanings.sent1: The ennoblement of the commoner brought joy to the entire village.
meanings.sent2: Her ennoblement through marriage to the prince was celebrated by all.
meanings.sent3: The ennoblement of the cat to royal status was met with disbelief by the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The ennoblement of the flower from weed to centerpiece was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The ennoblement of the old house with fresh paint made it look brand new.

meanings.definition: The process of elevating someone to a higher rank or position.
meanings.sent1: The ennoblement of the employee to manager was well-deserved.
meanings.sent2: Through hard work, she achieved ennoblement to the top position in the company.
meanings.sent3: The ennoblement of the dog to chief security officer was unexpected but effective.
meanings.sent4: The ennoblement of the student to class president was a proud moment for the school.
meanings.sent5: The ennoblement of the tree to tallest in the forest was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The state of being ennobled or elevated in status.
meanings.sent1: His ennoblement brought him respect and admiration from all.
meanings.sent2: She basked in the ennoblement that came with her new title.
meanings.sent3: The ennoblement of the squirrel to king of the park caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The ennoblement of the river to lifeline of the town was crucial for survival.
meanings.sent5: The ennoblement of the painting with a golden frame added a touch of elegance.
